MetadataHome.title: Andrei Florian Bratila
MetadataHome.description: I am a Full Stack developer specialized in Next.js, Solidity, and deployments with Github Actions and Nginx. I build efficient and scalable web and blockchain solutions.
MetadataHome.keywords: Web Development, Next.js, React, Solidity, Smart Contracts, Blockchain, Full Stack, Docker, Nginx, PostgreSQL, Web3
MetadataHome.OpenGraphTitle: Andrei Florian Bratila | Full Stack & Blockchain Developer

Jobs.title: Professional Experience
Jobs.description: Some of the companies and projects I have worked on.

items.title: Admin Panel Development
items.description: Creation of an admin panel focused on database security and web data management. Implementation of auto deployment on VPS using Nginx and webhooks.

items.title: Website and Panel Development
items.description: Development of the website from a Figma design and creation of an admin panel to modify website parameters. Configuration of PostgreSQL on server with auto deployment on VPS.

items.title: Web3 Integration with Blockchain
items.description: Development of a DApp connected to Metamask on the BSC network. Creation of smart contracts in Solidity, including NFTs and token management. Implementation of auto deployment on VPS with webhooks and an automated smart contract deployment system.

items.title: Website Creation and Design
items.description: Responsible for the design and development of the companyâ€™s website.

Certificates.title: Certificates
Certificates.description: Explore my certifications and professional achievements

items.title: Guide to mastering the language
items.description: Learn modern JavaScript from scratch to an advanced level, mastering key concepts like promises, DOM manipulation, and ESNext.

items.title: The React framework for production
items.description: Master Next.js from scratch and learn how to build production-optimized applications with rendering strategies, authentication, deployment, and more.

items.title: Practical guide for developers
items.description: Learn Docker from scratch and master the creation, management, and deployment of containers, including Dockerfiles, Docker Compose, and automation with GitHub Actions.

items.title: Blockchain/Web3 from beginner to expert
items.description: Master blockchain technology from scratch, learn to program Smart Contracts with Solidity, create ERC-20 tokens and NFTs, develop DApps with React, and deploy projects on Blockchain.

items.title: The Complete Guide (w/ Phaser 3)
items.description: Learn how to develop video games from scratch with Phaser and JavaScript. Create clones of Flappy Bird, the Chrome Dino Game, and a platformer with levels and custom attacks.

items.title: Your practical guide with PostgreSQL
items.description: Learn how to design, manage, and query relational databases with PostgreSQL. Master SQL statements, triggers, functions, stored procedures, database design, and more.

items.title: From beginner to expert (Hooks and MERN)
items.description: Learn React from scratch using Hooks and functional components. Includes FullStack development with MERN and unit testing.

items.title: Take your skills to the next level
items.description: Improve your React skills with Hooks and learn advanced concepts like TypeScript, PWA, deployments to NPM, Storybook, and more.

items.title: State management for React
items.description: Zustand is meant to be a direct replacement for Redux, Redux Toolkit, and React's ContextAPI.

items.title: Your complete guide and reference manual
items.description: Learn TypeScript from scratch and improve your JavaScript code with this type-based language, ideal for working with Angular, React, Node, and more.

items.title: Scalable backend development with Node
items.description: Learn NestJS from scratch and build robust backend applications with modular architecture and best practices. Master TypeORM, JWT authentication, WebSockets, and deployment with Docker.

items.title: Node: From beginner to expert
items.description: Learn Node.js from scratch with practical exercises and real-world applications. Master REST, WebSockets, databases, and cloud deployment.
